error.dirPathConflict: A directory with the same name already exists at this location.

delete.label: Delete property
delete.description: This will delete the property from the collection and remove it from all collection entries. This can't be undone.

number.label: Number
number.description: A number with various formatting options.

date.label: Date
date.description: A date and time field with various formatting options.

multiselect.label: Multiselect
multiselect.description: A dropdown list of options with multiple selection.

created.label: Created
created.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was created to its properties.

modified.label: Last modified
modified.description: Adds the date and time at which an entry was last modified to its properties.

itemName.label: Item name
itemName.helperText: The name of individual items in the collection.

tooltip.title: Move collection folder
tooltip.description: Move the collection folder to a different location on your computer.

tooltip.title: Remove from collections
tooltip.description: Remove from your collections but preserve the folder on your computer.

tooltip.title: Delete collection folder
tooltip.description: Delete the collection folder and all of its contents.

error.conflict: The name "{{name}}" is already taken. Please chose a different name.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Where would you like to put your new collection?
location.selectedHelperText: Your new collection will be created in:

error.missing: Please select a location for your collection.
error.conflict: A folder of the same name already exists at that location.

notes.label: Notes
notes.description: Write and organize your thoughts, ideas, and documents. Notes are stored as simple Markdown files.

files.label: Files
files.description: Store and organize any type of file with custom properties for additional context. Use this for documents, research papers, mood boards, or to simply organise your files.

items.label: Items
items.description: Flexible, property-based items. Ideal for tracking items like books, tasks, contacts, or any structured data you define.

weblinks.label: Weblinks
weblinks.description: Save and organize links with automatically fetched metadata. Great for saving articles, videos, or any other web content.

pages.label: Pages
pages.description: Create a collection of related pages. Pages can follow a strict template or simply share a common set of properties.

spaces.label: Spaces
spaces.description: Create a collection of spaces with a common set of properties. Great for quickly generating template based spaces for things like projects or complex topics.

workspaces.label: Workspaces
workspaces.definition: A workspace is simply a folder inside which your documents are stored as plain text Markdown files.

tooltip.title: Move workspace folder
tooltip.description: Move the workspace folder to a different location on your computer.

tooltip.title: Remove from workspaces
tooltip.description: Remove from your workspaces but preserve the folder on your computer.

tooltip.title: Delete workspace folder
tooltip.description: Delete the workspace folder and all of its contents.

quickstart.label: Quickstart
quickstart.description: Create a new workspace in your Documents folder.

create.label: Create workspace
create.description: Create a new workspace anywhere on your computer.

name.label: Workspace name
name.helperText: This will be the name of the parent folder which contains the workspace contents.

error.missing: Please enter a name for your workspace.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Where would you like to put your new workspace?
location.selectedHelperText: Your new workspace will be created in:

error.missing: Please select a location for your workspace.
error.conflict: A folder of the same name already exists at that location.

open.label: Open workspace
open.description: Open an existing folder of Markdown files to use as a workspace.

error.conflict: The name "{{name}}" is already taken. Please chose a different name.

tooltip.title: Delete document
tooltip.description: Delete the document and its related files.

error.conflict: The name "{{name}}" is already taken. Please chose a different name.

data.name: Data
data.description: Store formatted data related to things such as books, contacts, or tasks.

text.name: Text
text.description: Store text based items such as code snippets or quotes.

markdown.name: Markdown
markdown.description: Store rich text content using Markdown formatting.

url.name: Weblink
url.description: Store links to websites with automatically fetched metadata.

file.name: File
file.description: Store files of any type with custom properties for additional context.

image.name: Image
image.description: Store images with custom properties for additional context.

audio.name: Audio
audio.description: Store audio files with custom properties for additional context.

video.name: Video
video.description: Store video files with custom properties for additional context.

pdf.name: PDF
pdf.description: Store PDF documents with custom properties for additional context.
